S.FORM: Ni-hu-he'-zen "E'yi :Нивхи；Dipun: ニヴフ／ニブフ" numalumanay a ngangan han Ci-li-ya-ke'-zen, u Si-puo-li-ya wali timl kitidaan nu yuncumincu, kakenihan i Hia-lun-cen sasa katukuh sacumud nu bayuan atu Ku'-ye'-daw amisan, aydaay nu E'-luo-se-lenpan a Ha-pa-luo-hu-se-ke' lilisan atu Sa'-ha-lin-cuo. . nina kitidaan u kacelahan nu kilakilangan, diheku ku lalud, sienaw ku kasienawan yadah ku suleda, Ni-hu-he'-zen u mibutingay ku kawaw nuheni, miadup, nipahabayan tu wacu ku sakaudip, mililis tu bayu tu lalaud, kasienawan mabulaw tayda i masaenalay. . lalangawan 起源 sumamaday nu aydaay a cudadan, Ni-hu-he'-zen u tapangan utiih a kilimen, pibutingan nu daduducan nuheni, miadup tu i lilisay nu bayuan a mamuniay nu ukak a aadupan tu sakaudip, atu mitaduay tu mitengtengay nu wacu, misengi tu Kan-ca-cia subal a Kan-ca-cia-zen atu Ke-li-ya-ke'-cunan, tada nipisinzaan micapi tu Mea-cuo tipan amis a Sa-li-si-yi nu binacadan. . sipakayda i Tice-zenlei-sie atu mililiday amiadih, Ni-hu-he'-zen atu liwliway nu binacadan caay pilecad. aydaay a kaw-ku-sia-muosin sakamusa hatidaay tu nu sabaan a maudip namakayda i Way-pei-ciw-e buyuan nanay a Si'-se-ci' lalangawan, yu sumamad mikilul kunuheni tu babalaki mabulaw misaahebal taydan i Hei-lun-cin atu Ku'-ye-daw a kitidaan. . nina Si'-se-ci' lalangawan alaw awnu satabalay micumud i Min-cuo a lalangawan, itini i Pin-he zitay, Si'-se-ci' lalangawan maaymas kuni ka tayda i Si-puo-li-ya nu hatidaaytu nu picidekan a demiad nu kitidaan. . kilul sa tunika sumad nu demiad, mala nanum satu ku suleda, Tuon-ku-se binacadan maka nutipan mabulaw tayni, patuduan ku itidaay tu a yuncumin. Ni-hu-he'-zen mananam tu i tidaay a demiad ku nuheni caaya kaw mamasumad nu liwan a tademaw. . syakay 社會 itini i " kay-yun-sin-ce" sa, Ni-hu-he'-zen sepat ku niyadu' nuheni: Nan-ciw-e, Hu-li-ci, W'-la' atu Na-y. mananam kunuheni siacawa tu calekakanaan, u sabana ku sakatusa a acawaan. u banges nu wacu ku dikuc, mukan tu heci nu wacu, lalud han u kines nu buting ku dikuc. 在" . Ni-hu-he'-zen tatayna ku yadah tu tatami, sabaw tu cacay a mihcaan taneng tu mikikung, tatayna han asi acawa tu wacu, kya taneng atu tademaw mikikung, sakamusa ci Ta-min-yi-tun, mala sepat ku Ni-hu-he'-zen, isasa nu Lia-lun-cen, sacumud nu Hei-lun-cen amisan nu subalan, Ku'-ye-daw idaw tu, E'-huo-ce'-ke amisan idaw tu. atu malalamel tu hekalay nu tademawan. lalut han i bayubayuan maudip, kasienawan han i buyubuyuan maudip. . keyday 經濟 Ni-hu-he'-zen daduducen tu sakaudip han mibuting, miadup tu bayuay a aadupan, miadup i buyubuyu'an atu milami', atu pahabay tu tabakiay nu wacuan. wacu acacay ku pahabayan nuhini " nu cacaya a lalumaan tulu lima kunipahabayan". . ngangan nu Ni-hu-he'-zen ku buting tada kakanen nu heni. tu mihmihcaan mibuting tu kunuheni, u tapabaway talumaay nu buting ku dakepen nuheni, mahida u Kuy-yi atu Sen-yi, palahipuen nuheni mala kasienawan nu kakanen. . niyadu'村落 Ni-hu-he'-zen u mibutingay miadup ku kawaw nuhen, u sapahutinaw ku sakaudip nuheni, idaw ku laluday atu kasienawan a aenengan nuheni, nu tusaay atu wawaluay a lalumaan anikapulungan, nu sepatay a lalumaan ku yadhay. . satabakiay nu niyadu'an mapulung naming i Hei-lun-cen. nikay tidaan a mueneng amatenes itida, alahican malikid nu balat. patinaku cay-siw-cay-lim mihcaan atu cay-siw-num-wal a mihcaan tayniyan nu balat mamin malekep ku niyadu' nu Ni-hu-he'-zen. . kasaliwsiwan nu demiad, tatamaan nu niyadu' tahekal namin miadup, tatayna hantu milami i umaumahan. katukuh satu i kasienawan, mabulaw namin ku niyadu'ay a tademaw taydan i sawacan nu kasienawan a mueneng, mibuting itida. manamuh ku nuheni taydan nu labang, i pabaway nu Hei-lun-cen a tademaw Na-nay-zen hatidaay tu nu sienaw hnina tayda ku nuheni i Ni-hu-he'-zen palabang. .

Ni-ho-he'-zen "E'yi :Нивхи；Dipon: ニヴフ／ニブフ" nomalomanay a ngangan han Ci-li-ya-ke'-zen, o Si-poo-li-ya wali timl kitidaan no yoncominco, kakenihan i Hia-lon-cen sasa katokoh sacomod no bayoan ato Ko'-ye'-daw amisan, aydaay no E'-loo-se-lenpan a Ha-pa-loo-ho-se-ke' lilisan ato Sa'-ha-lin-coo. . nina kitidaan o kacelahan no kilakilangan, diheko ko lalod, sienaw ko kasienawan yadah ko soleda, Ni-ho-he'-zen o mibotingay ko kawaw noheni, miadop, nipahabayan to waco ko sakaodip, mililis to bayo to lalaod, kasienawan mabolaw tayda i masaenalay. . lalangawan 起源 somamaday no aydaay a codadan, Ni-ho-he'-zen o tapangan otiih a kilimen, pibotingan no dadodocan noheni, miadop to i lilisay no bayoan a mamoniay no okak a aadopan to sakaodip, ato mitadoay to mitengtengay no waco, misengi to Kan-ca-cia sobal a Kan-ca-cia-zen ato Ke-li-ya-ke'-conan, tada nipisinzaan micapi to Mea-coo tipan amis a Sa-li-si-yi no binacadan. . sipakayda i Tice-zenlei-sie ato mililiday amiadih, Ni-ho-he'-zen ato liwliway no binacadan caay pilecad. aydaay a kaw-ko-sia-moosin sakamosa hatidaay to no sabaan a maodip namakayda i Way-pei-ciw-e boyoan nanay a Si'-se-ci' lalangawan, yo somamad mikilol konoheni to babalaki mabolaw misaahebal taydan i Hei-lon-cin ato Ko'-ye-daw a kitidaan. . nina Si'-se-ci' lalangawan alaw awno satabalay micomod i Min-coo a lalangawan, itini i Pin-he zitay, Si'-se-ci' lalangawan maaymas koni ka tayda i Si-poo-li-ya no hatidaayto no picidekan a demiad no kitidaan. . kilol sa tonika somad no demiad, mala nanom sato ko soleda, Toon-ko-se binacadan maka notipan mabolaw tayni, patodoan ko itidaay to a yoncomin. Ni-ho-he'-zen mananam to i tidaay a demiad ko noheni caaya kaw mamasomad no liwan a tademaw. . syakay 社會 itini i " kay-yon-sin-ce" sa, Ni-ho-he'-zen sepat ko niyado' noheni: Nan-ciw-e, Ho-li-ci, W'-la' ato Na-y. mananam konoheni siacawa to calekakanaan, o sabana ko sakatosa a acawaan. o banges no waco ko dikoc, mokan to heci no waco, lalod han o kines no boting ko dikoc. 在" . Ni-ho-he'-zen tatayna ko yadah to tatami, sabaw to cacay a mihcaan taneng to mikikong, tatayna han asi acawa to waco, kya taneng ato tademaw mikikong, sakamosa ci Ta-min-yi-ton, mala sepat ko Ni-ho-he'-zen, isasa no Lia-lon-cen, sacomod no Hei-lon-cen amisan no sobalan, Ko'-ye-daw idaw to, E'-hoo-ce'-ke amisan idaw to. ato malalamel to hekalay no tademawan. lalot han i bayobayoan maodip, kasienawan han i boyoboyoan maodip. . keyday 經濟 Ni-ho-he'-zen dadodocen to sakaodip han miboting, miadop to bayoay a aadopan, miadop i boyoboyo'an ato milami', ato pahabay to tabakiay no wacoan. waco acacay ko pahabayan nohini " no cacaya a lalomaan tolo lima konipahabayan". . ngangan no Ni-ho-he'-zen ko boting tada kakanen no heni. to mihmihcaan miboting to konoheni, o tapabaway talomaay no boting ko dakepen noheni, mahida o Koy-yi ato Sen-yi, palahipoen noheni mala kasienawan no kakanen. . niyado'村落 Ni-ho-he'-zen o mibotingay miadop ko kawaw nohen, o sapahotinaw ko sakaodip noheni, idaw ko laloday ato kasienawan a aenengan noheni, no tosaay ato wawaloay a lalomaan anikapolongan, no sepatay a lalomaan ko yadhay. . satabakiay no niyado'an mapolong naming i Hei-lon-cen. nikay tidaan a moeneng amatenes itida, alahican malikid no balat. patinako cay-siw-cay-lim mihcaan ato cay-siw-nom-wal a mihcaan tayniyan no balat mamin malekep ko niyado' no Ni-ho-he'-zen. . kasaliwsiwan no demiad, tatamaan no niyado' tahekal namin miadop, tatayna hanto milami i omaomahan. katokoh sato i kasienawan, mabolaw namin ko niyado'ay a tademaw taydan i sawacan no kasienawan a moeneng, miboting itida. manamoh ko noheni taydan no labang, i pabaway no Hei-lon-cen a tademaw Na-nay-zen hatidaay to no sienaw hnina tayda ko noheni i Ni-ho-he'-zen palabang. .
